mapper.insert: insert into comment( user_id, post_id, content, created_by, updated_by) values (#{userId}, #{postId}, #{commentContent}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy})
mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.admin_id, c.user_id, c.post_id, c.parent_id, u.user_name, c.content, c.activate_flag, c.adopted_flag, c.created_by, c.updated_by, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.delete_flag from comment c inner join board.user u on c.user_id = u.user_id where post_id = #{postId} and c.delete_flag = 'N' limit #{pageRowCount} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from comment where post_id = #{postId} and delete_flag = 'N'
